channel.title: Weird Error ;p

item.title: Weird Error ;p
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:2, topic:429193”]Try this

Excerpted from my source that has 100% skills (Realm Onwards)

	public void createGroundItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount) {
		synchronized(c) {
			c.getOutStream().createFrame(85);
			c.getOutStream().writeByteC((itemY - 8 * c.mapRegionY));
			c.getOutStream().writeByteC((itemX - 8 * c.mapRegionX));
			c.getOutStream().createFrame(44);
			c.getOutStream().writeWordBigEndianA(itemID);
			c.getOutStream().writeWord(itemAmount);
			c.getOutStream().writeByte(0);	
			c.flushOutStream();
		}
	}

Not sure if there is a difference between the two.[/quote]

There is no difference, still need this ;3

EDIT: Think i fixed

item.title: Weird Error ;p
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Either the client object, or the OutputStream of the client is null.

Besides, why are you synchronizing on the client?

Weasey:

You cant offer money or your thread gets locked… for some gay ass reason. Just warning you.

Because we don’t want people to help only when there’s a reward involved.

The incentive should be to share knowledge and help those who ask, not financial gain.

item.title: Weird Error ;p
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Try this

Excerpted from my source that has 100% skills (Realm Onwards)

	public void createGroundItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount) {
		synchronized(c) {
			c.getOutStream().createFrame(85);
			c.getOutStream().writeByteC((itemY - 8 * c.mapRegionY));
			c.getOutStream().writeByteC((itemX - 8 * c.mapRegionX));
			c.getOutStream().createFrame(44);
			c.getOutStream().writeWordBigEndianA(itemID);
			c.getOutStream().writeWord(itemAmount);
			c.getOutStream().writeByte(0);	
			c.flushOutStream();
		}
	}

Not sure if there is a difference between the two.

item.title: Weird Error ;p
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

[1/14/12 2:56 AM]: bloods121 playerCommand: object 2728 [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: at server.model.items.ItemAssistant.createGroundItem(Ite mAssistant.java:2522) [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: at server.world.ItemHandler.createGroundItem(ItemHandler .java:172) [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: at server.model.players.skills.Firemaking$3.execute(Fire making.java:155) [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: at server.event.CycleEventContainer.execute(CycleEventCo ntainer.java:59) [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: at server.event.CycleEventHandler.process(CycleEventHand ler.java:63) [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:159) [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: Saved game for bloods121. [1/14/12 2:56 AM]: Saving players... Press any key to continue . . .

This error happened when i was testing cooking last nite and it made the server shut down.

public void createGroundItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount) { synchronized(c) { c.getOutStream().createFrame(85); c.getOutStream().writeByteC((itemY - 8 * c.mapRegionY)); c.getOutStream().writeByteC((itemX - 8 * c.mapRegionX)); c.getOutStream().createFrame(44); c.getOutStream().writeWordBigEndianA(itemID); c.getOutStream().writeWord(itemAmount); c.getOutStream().writeByte(0); c.flushOutStream(); } }

Code in red is line 2522, of itemassistant.java

IF SOMEONE CAN FIX THIS I WILL PAY 5M RSGP
